title: Imam of Peace on Twitter
body: This leader has a vision that goes beyond picking a fight with plastic straws. In just 50 years, he and his late father have achieved more economic growth for the UAE 🇦🇪 than any other country in the world. He was the first to sign and ratify the Paris Agreement, commit to an economy-wide reduction in emissions and announce an initiative to achieve net zero by 2050.
